formNotFound.title: Form Not Found
formNotFound.description: The form you're looking for doesn't exist or you don't have permission to view it.

responseNotFound.title: Response Not Found
responseNotFound.description: The response you're trying to edit doesn't exist or you don't have permission to edit it.

formNotReady.title: Form Not Ready
formNotReady.description: This form is not yet configured. Please try again later.

loading.pleaseWait: Please wait while we save your changes.

updateError.title: Failed to update response
updateError.description: An error occurred while updating the response
